pr_title: [WFLY-13578] adding integration failure tests for WFTC remote call with txn propagation

timeline.message:
[WFLY-13578] adding integration failure tests for WFTC remote call with txn propagation

the first one is to add a test for WFTC registry immediate commit call

the second integration test target the behaviour of 1PC heuristic
outcome after the commit call for the EJB remote txn propagation
